entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early this evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Clearing before morning. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this evening then becoming light late this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023
